Trade/Device Name(s): Verigene® CYP2C19 Nucleic Acid Test (CYP2C19 Test)
Regulation Name(s): Instrumentation for Clinical Multiplex Test Systems
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Verigene CYP2C19 Nucleic Acid Test, a microarray-based system for CYP2C19 genotyping from whole blood on the Verigene System.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative multiplexed test for simultaneous detection and identification of CYP450 2C19 genotype (*2, *3, *17) in genomic DNA from EDTA-anticoagulated whole blood, used as an aid to clinicians in determining therapeutic strategy for drugs metabolized by CYP2C19; not for predicting drug response or non-response.
